name: Trucking World: Mission Danger
description:
Trucking World: Mission Dangerous Hill is an acttion packed realistic truck simulator game that will test your driving skills in real traffic!. Get ready for the realistic and exciting driving experience. Drive cargo truck simulator and explore the hilly environment and test your mountain driving skills. Driving on hills, mountains and steep paths is a real driving challenge and adventure in offroad cargo truck .
Features:
- Amazing trucks (next generation trucks)
- Realistic driving experience
- Cross the whole Europe outback
- True transportation systems
- Be impressed by the trucking
- Actual weather
- Damage and fuel consumption.
